alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 4:25PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jackson County through 415 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marianna, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Cottondale, Greenwood, Alford, Kynesville, Blue Spring, Steele City, Star, Simsville, Cypress, Cottondale Airport, Chipola Terrace and Marianna Municipal A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
